lead_paragraph: A much more relaxed Roger Goodell delivered his Super Bowl state-of-the-league address on Friday than the under-fire NFL commissioner who last year was left to defend his job performance following string of scandals.

headline.print_headline: Relaxed Goodell Back in Control and Charting New Course
headline.main: Relaxed Goodell Back in Control and Charting New Course

snippet: A much more relaxed Roger Goodell delivered his Super Bowl state-of-the-league address on Friday than the under-fire NFL commissioner who last year was left to defend his job performance following string of scandals....
